Install¶

Require:

  • PostgreSQL
  • psycopg2
  • fortune

Install fortune:

sudo apt-get install fortune

Note

For Debian like pkg system.

Clone project to local machine:

git clone git@github.com:uralbash/pyramid_sacrud_example.git

Edit development.ini postgres connection line and create db in PostgreSQL.

Initialize project:

initialize_example_db development.ini

Run protject:

pserve development.ini

Folow to http://localhost:6543/admin/
